trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 지원을 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch to a designer view (such as `Design` view in [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), the markup that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 뷰로 전환 하는 경우 비주얼 디자이너에서 (같은 `Design` 의 [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), 태그를 설명 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤은 구문 분석 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: A design-time version of the control is then created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 디자인 화면에 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 버전이 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: When you switch to source view, the design-time control is persisted as markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 소스 뷰로 전환 하는 경우 디자인 타임 컨트롤 웹 페이지에 대 한 태그도 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the DataPagerDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns the list of items that are used to create a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: 다음 기능을 제공 하는 DataPagerDesigner 클래스의 속성:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.ActionLists%2A>속성 스마트 태그 패널을 만드는 사용 되는 항목의 목록을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PagedControlID%2A> property is used as the designer (shadowed) version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PagedControlID%2A>속성은 디자이너 (숨겨진된) 버전의으로 사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PagedControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the templated pager fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>속성이 연결 되어 있는 템플릿 페이저 필드에 대 한 템플릿 그룹의 컬렉션을 반환 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, which indicates that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control in order to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>속성은 항상 반환 `true`, 디자이너의 연결 된 임시 복사본을 만듭니다 나타냅니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>디자인 타임 태그를 생성 하기 위해 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods of the DataPagerDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods return the HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> at design time.
trans-unit.target: DataPagerDesigner 클래스의 메서드는 다음 기능을 제공:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>메서드는 연결 된 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 HTML 태그를 반환 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>디자인 타임에.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.Initialize%2A>메서드 디자이너를 표시, 편집 및 연결 된 디자인을 준비 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add or remove properties from the properties grid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>메서드에서에서 추가 하거나 제거할 속성에 대 한 속성 표를 사용는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner>연결 된 만들 때 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤 또는 디자인 화면에서 해당 컨트롤의 복사본입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of items that are used to create the smart tag panel for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 스마트 태그 패널을 만드는 사용 되는 항목의 목록을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of items that are used to create the smart tag panel for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 스마트 태그 패널을 만드는 데 사용 되는 항목 목록이 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Generates the HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 HTML 태그를 생성 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 디자인 타임에 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection is not empty, the GetDesignTimeHtml method refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to be called and then calls its base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션이 비어 있지 않으면, GetDesignTimeHtml 메서드를 새로 고칩니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>개체를는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>호출할 메서드를 호출 하는 기본 구현입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection is empty, the GetDesignTimeHtml method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션은 비어, GetDesignTimeHtml 메서드가 호출 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>메서드는 태그를 생성 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 렌더링 하는 데 사용 되는 HTML 태그를 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 디자인 타임에 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Generates the HTML markup that represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time that has no visual representation at run time.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 HTML 태그를 생성 한 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 런타임 시 시각적 표시가 있는 디자인 타임에 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method is used by the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control at design time if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml 메서드는 디자이너에서 렌더링 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>경우 디자인 타임에 컨트롤는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션은 비어 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29> method to create a placeholder that displays the type and the ID of the control, and additional instructions for the user.
trans-unit.target: GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml 메서드 호출의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29>메서드를 형식과 제어 및 사용자에 대 한 추가 지침의 ID를 표시 하는 자리 표시자를 만듭니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that represents an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 빈 표시 하는 HTML 태그 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 디자인 타임에 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너를 초기화 하 고 지정된 된 컨트롤을 로드 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너를 사용 하 여 렌더링할 준비가 되 면 디자이너 호스트 Initialize 메서드를 호출는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are required for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 메서드 및 기본 메서드 속성을 구성 하 고 디자이너에 필요한 이벤트에 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: `component` 매개 변수는는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>의 복사본 또는이 디자이너와 연결 된 컨트롤에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The control being designed.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 되는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value for the designer version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 버전에 대 한 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes properties from the property grid for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하거나 속성에 대 한 속성 그리드에서 제거 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method adds a new property to the property grid of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control that corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 새 속성의 속성 표를 추가 하는 PreFilterProperties 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>에 해당 하는 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property is set to `true`, the PreFilterProperties method also sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `BrowsableAttribute.No`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>속성이 `true`, PreFilterProperties 메서드 설정는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>특성에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 `BrowsableAttribute.No`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents pager fields from being deleted by using the `Fields` dialog box when a templated pager field is in template mode.
trans-unit.target: 페이저 필드를 사용 하 여 삭제를 이렇게는 `Fields` 템플릿 페이저 필드 템플릿 모드일 때 대화 상자.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the properties that are exposed in the property grid for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 속성 표에 표시 되는 속성을 포함 하는 컬렉션의 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 디자인 타임에 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the templated pager fields of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 템플릿 페이저 필드에 대 한 템플릿 그룹의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property creates a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects that represent the template elements in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: TemplateGroups 속성의 컬렉션을 만들고 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>템플릿 요소를 나타내는 개체를 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>디자인 타임에 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: It adds one element to the collection for each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> collection of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 각 컬렉션에 요소 하나를 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A>연결 되어 있는 컬렉션 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>

trans-unit.source: A collection of template groups for the templated pager fields of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 템플릿 페이저 필드에 대 한 템플릿 그룹의 컬렉션 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy instead of the actual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control that is associated with the designer in order to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 대신 실제 임시 복사본을 사용 해야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> 디자인 타임 태그를 생성 하기 위해 디자이너와 연결 된 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>모든 경우
